item.title: True Blood
item.description: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

shorttext.p: Sarah is captured and kept prisoner at Fangtasia. Jason and Jessica feel Violet's wrath. Lettie Mae bids farewell to Tara, witnessing what Tara wanted her to. Through Sookie, Bill is made aware of the cure, but will he accept it?

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

shorttext.p: After Skinny Pete gets ripped off, Walt makes Jesse go get the money. Meanwhile, Walt's cover story on how Elliott and Gretchen are paying for his medical treatment is on the verge of collapsing.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

shorttext.p: David must choose between staying with Kathryn or leaving her to be with Mary Margaret, with whom he's fallen deeply in love. Meanwhile, Prince Charming is about to encounter a life-changing event that will forever alter his destiny.

item.title: Under the Dome
item.description: With Big Jim and Rebecca in jail, townsfolk begin to take sides leading to violence and a death. Julia urges everyone to combine their food supplies, but it all backfires when the food storage facility at the fire station is blown up.

shorttext.p: With Big Jim and Rebecca in jail, townsfolk begin to take sides leading to violence and a death. Julia urges everyone to combine their food supplies, but it all backfires when the food storage facility at the fire station is blown up.

item.title: Pretty Little Liars
item.description: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

shorttext.p: Shana tells Emily that she has a message from Ali, but can Emily and the girls trust Shana with all that they know about her? And when Shana ups the stakes and says that Ali wants to meet Emily could it all be part of it.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

shorttext.p: Peter Declan has been charged with murdering his wife, and only Oliver believes he's innocent. Arrow asks Laurel to look into Declan's case. Meanwhile, Walter investigates a warehouse that Moria mysteriously bought with the company's money.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

shorttext.p: Tom uncovers confidential intelligence about the heart of the alien operation. Meanwhile, Charleston prepares to mount an offensive against the Espheni, but a massive explosion brings the operation to a halt.

item.title: Continuum
item.description: Keira Cameron's world has disintegrated. Alec Sadler betrayed her chance of going back to 2077, using the time travel device in hope of saving his girlfriend. Now Kiera & Liber8, prisoners of the Freelancers scramble to escape their grasp.

shorttext.p: Keira Cameron's world has disintegrated. Alec Sadler betrayed her chance of going back to 2077, using the time travel device in hope of saving his girlfriend. Now Kiera & Liber8, prisoners of the Freelancers scramble to escape their grasp.

item.title: Manhattan
item.series: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love
item.description: Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

shorttext.p: Season 1, Ep. 1: The One You Love

Charlie Isaacs and his family arrive in Los Alamos and attempt to navigate a community built on secrets. Frank Winter, the head of the Manhattan Project, struggles with the sacrifices he is making to help the U.S. win World War II.

item.title: True Blood
item.description: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

shorttext.p: The former King of Mississippi is taken prisoner and put in a cell at the Authority. Not quite knowing what might be in store for them on their return, Bill and Eric are happy to see that Roman welcomes them back with open arms.

item.title: True Detective
item.description: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

shorttext.p: Cohle and Martin finally get a new wind in the case and can confirm a suspect. Martin's mistress gets on with somebody else leaving him furious. Cohle's theory becomes increasingly more convincing than ever.

item.title: Outlander
item.description: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

shorttext.p: Claire is brought to Castle Leoch under suspicion as an English spy. Learning that the year is 1743, she tries to arrange travel back to the standing stones. Colum MacKenzie uses her ability as a healer as an excuse to detain her.

item.title: Breaking Bad
item.description: Hank asks Walt to drive him to the laundry where the meth lab is hidden. Ted still won't pay the IRS so Skyler asks Saul for help, and Saul sends in his A-Team. Gus and Jesse return from Mexico, and Walt fears he is in trouble with Gus.

shorttext.p: Hank asks Walt to drive him to the laundry where the meth lab is hidden. Ted still won't pay the IRS so Skyler asks Saul for help, and Saul sends in his A-Team. Gus and Jesse return from Mexico, and Walt fears he is in trouble with Gus.

item.title: Once Upon a Time
item.description: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

shorttext.p: As Henry's life hangs in the balance, the race is on to stop Pan from gaining full power from the heart of the truest believer. Back in Storybrooke of the past, Regina decides to fill a void in her life and sets out to adopt a baby.

item.description: While the media interview the peace delegates, Jack and Cole have gone rogue to rescue a traitor being tortured by off-the-grid operatives; Logan gets President Taylor to approve putting his aide in charge of the manhunt.

shorttext.p: While the media interview the peace delegates, Jack and Cole have gone rogue to rescue a traitor being tortured by off-the-grid operatives; Logan gets President Taylor to approve putting his aide in charge of the manhunt.

item.title: Orange Is the New Black
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change
item.description: The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 11: It Was the Change

The prison guards finally crack down on the inmates to stop the smuggling issue. Tensions run high as a prison power outage forces several issues to come to light; Piper finds herself compromised and is forced to think on her feet.

item.title: Arrow
item.description: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

shorttext.p: Oliver awakens to find himself Malcolm Merlyn's prisoner. He manages to escape and away with help from Digg. Malcolm accelerates his timetable as a result. Lance about her hacking activities but is interrupted by Oliver.

item.title: Grimm
item.description: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

shorttext.p: As a deadly crime spree begins to surface, a century-old urban legend takes shape in Portland's sewers and becomes Nick's latest case. Adalind meets Prince Viktor, who brings those responsible for his cousin Eric's demise to justice.

item.title: Glee
item.description: Nervous for opening night, Rachel is willing to do anything to succeed. When she finds out that Jacob Ben Isreal is writing a review of the show for the New Yorker, her director pressures her to do whatever it takes for a good review.

shorttext.p: Nervous for opening night, Rachel is willing to do anything to succeed. When she finds out that Jacob Ben Isreal is writing a review of the show for the New Yorker, her director pressures her to do whatever it takes for a good review.

item.title: Game of Thrones
item.description: Arya makes friends with Gendry. Tyrion tries to take control of the small council. Theon arrives at his home, Pyke, in order to persuade his father into helping Robb with the war. Jon tries to investigate Craster's secret.

shorttext.p: Arya makes friends with Gendry. Tyrion tries to take control of the small council. Theon arrives at his home, Pyke, in order to persuade his father into helping Robb with the war. Jon tries to investigate Craster's secret.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother
item.description: As the wedding approaches, Barney and Robin deliberately ruin an obnoxious couple's evening, Marshall and Lily's plans for Italy hit a snag, Ted tells Lily that he's moving to Chicago, and the mother buys her ticket to Farhampton.

shorttext.p: As the wedding approaches, Barney and Robin deliberately ruin an obnoxious couple's evening, Marshall and Lily's plans for Italy hit a snag, Ted tells Lily that he's moving to Chicago, and the mother buys her ticket to Farhampton.

item.title: Haven
item.description: A series of exsanguinated bodies have the police at a loss to explain the deaths. Everyone is angry at Nathan for shooting Agent Howard and destroying the barn, but it would appear that some are more angry than others.

shorttext.p: A series of exsanguinated bodies have the police at a loss to explain the deaths. Everyone is angry at Nathan for shooting Agent Howard and destroying the barn, but it would appear that some are more angry than others.

item.title: Gotham
item.description: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

shorttext.p: A new recruit in Captain Sarah Essen's Gotham City Police Department, Detective James Gordon is paired with Harvey Bullock to solve one of Gotham's most high-profile cases ever: the murder of Thomas and Martha Wayne.

item.title: Defiance
item.series: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax
item.description: Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

shorttext.p: Season 2, Ep. 3: The Cord and the Ax

Irisa's terrifying black-outs escalate, driving a wedge of secrecy between her and a worried Nolan. Meanwhile, the Tarr family business thrives under Stahma's self-appointed direction while an increasingly suspicious Datak remains in jail.

item.title: Falling Skies
item.description: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly.

shorttext.p: Tom and the 2nd Mass hatch an elaborate plan to escape the confines of the Espheni Ghetto. Meanwhile back in Chinatown, after learning from Ben that Lexi has been keeping a deadly secret, Maggie confronts Lexi publicly.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: Howard tries to do something special to celebrate the anniversary of his first date with Bernadette. Sheldon is conflicted when he makes a major scientific breakthrough but some details have to be corrected.

shorttext.p: Howard tries to do something special to celebrate the anniversary of his first date with Bernadette. Sheldon is conflicted when he makes a major scientific breakthrough but some details have to be corrected.

item.title: Agents of Shield
item.description: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

shorttext.p: Dark secrets are revealed as Coulson and his team put everything on the line to stop Garrett and the forces of Hydra. Everyone tries to track down a former agent who is now stealing highly valuable information.

item.title: The Big Bang Theory
item.description: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

shorttext.p: Leonard and Amy take an unexpected road trip to Arizona to pick up Sheldon. Meanwhile, Penny interviews for a job at Bernadette's company, and Howard is weirded out by Stuart's relationship with Mrs. Wolowitz.

item.title: New Girl
item.description: Jess pretends to be a fan of the Pistons in an attempt to befriend Coach, to Nick's dismay, who is a Bulls fan. Meanwhile, Schmidt is assigned to mentor an elderly colleague at work and Winston discovers a new career path.

shorttext.p: Jess pretends to be a fan of the Pistons in an attempt to befriend Coach, to Nick's dismay, who is a Bulls fan. Meanwhile, Schmidt is assigned to mentor an elderly colleague at work and Winston discovers a new career path.

item.title: The Walking Dead
item.description: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

shorttext.p: As the sick are quarantined, Daryl, Tyreese, Michonne and Bob leave the prison in search of medical supplies. Rick makes a shocking discovery. Rick and Carol go to a nearby town where they find two uninfected stragglers.

item.title: Da Vinci's Demons
item.description: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and breaks into the Vatican through the sewer. He meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the identity of spy in Rome. Later, the search for the Medici's spy intensifies.

shorttext.p: Leonardo builds an underwater suit and breaks into the Vatican through the sewer. He meets the Pope and the mysterious prisoner. Giuliano reveals the identity of spy in Rome. Later, the search for the Medici's spy intensifies.
